entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain late this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
